arts.ttl: Arsenal 4-1 Valerenga: Gunners give perfect response to Jonas Eidevall's resignation as they record big Champions League win just 48 hours after Swede quit amid fan protests
arts.sum: KATHRYN BATTE AT THE EMIRATES: A comfortable victory after the resignation of their manager, Jonas Eidevall, was exactly what Arsenal needed. Perfect performance? Not quite.

arts.ttl: The Verdict: Post Eidevall Arsenal start with impressive win
arts.sum: Arsenal Women get off to a flying start after the resignation of Jonas Eidevall with a impressive 4-1 victory over Valerenga in the Champions League.

arts.ttl: Arsenal ease past Valerenga to win first game since Eidevall's exit
arts.sum: Managerless Arsenal won their first Women's Champions League group game of the season as they beat Valerenga 4-1 at the Emirates Stadium, just a day after boss Jonas Eidevall resigned.

arts.ttl: Arsenal hit four past Vaalerenga in first match since Jonas Eidevallâ€™s departure
arts.sum: Renee Slegers has been placed in temporary charge.

It was a busy first round of action several days ago as Bayern Munich crushed Arsenal 5-2, Manchester City recorded a shock 2-0 win over current holders Barcelona, and Chelsea scraped past Real Madrid 3-2 at Stamford Bridge. However, this week's Italian hosts had to beat Paris Saint-Germain in qualifying to reach the group stage of the competition, and they did so with an emphatic 5-2 aggregate win.

arts.ttl: The inside story of why Jonas Eidevall left Arsenal
arts.sum: Jonas Eidevall resigned as Arsenal manager, but what led to the decision, and how does the women's team move on now?

arts.ttl: Arsenal Women vs Valerenga Women: Preview, predictions and lineups
arts.sum: Arsenal desperately need three points when they face Valerenga in the UEFA Women's Champions League (WUCL) on Wednesday night. There's been significant news out of Arsenal ahead of this game, with the club confirming on Tuesday that long-time head coach Jonas Eidevall has resigned from his post following a poor start to the 2024/25 season.

This season marks Valerenga's first in the UEFA Women's Champions League group stages, having defeated Farul Constanta and Anderlecht to qualify. The last UWCL fixture played at Emirates Stadium was our 2023 semi-final against Wolfsburg, which ended in a valiant extra-time loss.

arts.ttl: Kim Little issues rallying cry after shock Jonas Eidevall exit
arts.sum: Arsenal captain Kim Little has issued a rallying cry to her teammates following the news of head coach Jonas Eidevall's resignation. However, club captain Little insists the responsibility rests with the players to step up in this period of uncertainty.

arts.ttl: 'Flabbergasted' Sarina Wiegman reacts to sudden Jonas Eidevall resignation
arts.sum: After a challenging start to the season for the WSL club, which includes one win from their opening four league games, it was confirmed on Tuesday morning that the Swede had vacated his position as head coach. Less than an hour after news of Eidevall's immediate departure broke, Lionesses boss Wiegman sat down to address the media following the latest squad announcement .
